optionalfeature.name: Proficiency
entries: As a bonus action, you harry the body or mind of a creature within 30 feet of you, making them susceptible to forceful influence. Until the end of your next turn, Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks made against the cursed creature have advantage.

entries.name: Amplify
entries: The next Wisdom saving throw the cursed creature makes before this curse ends has disadvantage.
